Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters of each reflection quality level.

localLightEnabled.Wiki: If ON, reflections from the player's local light are enabled.

localLightForceEnabled.Wiki: If ON, reflections from the player's local light are forcefully enabled.

resolutionDivider.Wiki: The resolution scale to use for reflections.

ssrEnabled.Wiki: If ON, screen-space reflections are enabled.

ssrGaussianBlurEnabled.Wiki: If ON, screen-space gaussian blur is enabled.

ssrDepthRejectThresholdScale.Wiki: The depth rejection threshold scale to use for screen-space reflections.

ssrRayTraceStepScale.Wiki: The raytracing step scale to use with the Screen-space Reflection parameter.

ssrFadeToViewerBias.Wiki: The screen-space reflection angle bias to apply when fading a reflection. Smaller values result in higher quality.

ssrFresnelRejectBias.Wiki: The screen-space reflection fresnel rejection bias to apply to a reflection. Smaller values result in higher quality.
